definition: second party (law)/see also 甲方[jia3 fang1]

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: All arbitration fees will be borne by Party B and be paid in advance.
sentences.chinese: 涉及仲裁费用，全部由乙方承担并预交。

sentences.english: Party B shall still have the ownership of the equipment until Party B is paid in full.
sentences.chinese: 甲方未付清全款前，设备的所有权仍归乙方所有。

sentences.english: The charge of water is settled and paid to the actual usage each month.
sentences.chinese: 乙方使用的自来水费按实结算，每月支付甲方。

sentences.english: The undermentioned project is consigned by Party A to Party B.
sentences.chinese: 本工程由甲方委托乙方总承包及施工。

sentences.english: B is responsible for staging the pick to go abroad and accommodation arrangements and costs.
sentences.chinese: 负责乙方出国集结地的接机和食宿安排和费用。

sentences.english: Party B will not transfer the lease of the premises or sub without Party A's approval.
sentences.chinese: 未经甲方同意，乙方不得将承租的房屋转租或分租。

sentences.english: Part B shall guarantee that the machines to be provided are in accordance with Part A's requirements and specifications.
sentences.chinese: 乙方保证其供给的机器符合甲方的要求和规格。

sentences.english: The components and auxiliary materials, etc, supplied by party bare to be shipped from Japan to Henna.
sentences.chinese: 收乙方提供的元件和辅助材料等将从日本装运至河南。

sentences.english: UL-STR shall not be held responsible for these risks, which are out of its control.
sentences.chinese: 乙方不对此等超出乙方控制范围的风险负有责任。

sentences.english: UL-STR shall not be held responsible for these risks, which are out of its control.
sentences.chinese: 乙方不对此等超出乙方控制范围的风险负有责任。

sentences.english: III Party A shall issue invoices fulfilling with requirements of Party B and other departments.
sentences.chinese: 甲方开具满足乙方及相关部门要求的发票。

sentences.english: The State regulation shall apply during Employee's sick leave and medical treatment period.
sentences.chinese: 乙方患病或非因工负伤的医疗期限，按国家规定确定。

sentences.english: III. Party A guarantees that they will provide complete and high quality service, to satisfy the customers.
sentences.chinese: 甲方保证为乙方提供全面优质服务，使客人达到满意。

sentences.english: Sixth, like the second party changes for some reason, the first party does not return the rent.
sentences.chinese: 如乙方因故变动，甲方不退还租金。

sentences.english: Party B causes great loss to Party A due to its breach of duty and jobbery.
sentences.chinese: 乙方严重失职，营私舞弊，给甲方利益造成重大损失。

sentences.english: Party B agrees that the expiration of this license shall not discharge party B from its obligation.
sentences.chinese: 乙方同意在许可证到期时并不免除乙方应尽义务。

definition: first party (law)/see also 乙方[yi3 fang1]
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions

to agree on sth (after discussion)/to conclude a bargain/to arrange/to promise/to stipulate/to make an appointment/stipulated (time, amount, quality etc)/an arrangement/a deal/appointment/undertaking/commitment/understanding/engagement/stipulation
